messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] pigeons
messages.msgSnippet: ***Coccidia. Bird dog disease. From training with pigeons.*** I thought other critters carried it too.  I think my brother s dog got it (or a form of it)
messages.messageBody:
***Coccidia. "Bird dog" disease. From training with pigeons.***

I thought other critters carried it too. I think my brother's dog got it
(or a form of it) from eating moles.
Maybe I have my nasty organisms mixed up. (My Coccidia, that is, not my
brother and his dog.)

Deb L

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] pigeons

messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/25/2003 12:28:13 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
SandraDodd@... writes:

> Pigeons spread disease!?
>
Coccidia. "Bird dog" disease. From training with pigeons.

~Kelly
